newsitem.title: USA: FPC restores full power at Crystal River 3.
newsitem.headline: FPC restores full power at Crystal River 3.

text.p: Florida Power Corp's (FPC) 825 megawatt (MW) Crystal River 3 nuclear generating unit is again operating at full power, the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) said Friday.
The Red Level, Fla., unit was reduced to 60 percent power late Tuesday to correct a condensate pump problem.
Crystal River produces 15 percent of the electricity FPC delivers in its Florida service territory.
FPC is a subsidiary of Florida Progress Corp.
